rev.comment: /* B.I.T.E. */ Hm, copyvio yes, good catch, but just rewrite; the reference is to Steven Alan Hassan, a licensed, recognized anticult authority - see http://www.freedomofmind.com/stevehassan/presskit/
/* B.I.T.E. */ delete section that is (a) sourced to a self-published website, and (b) appears to be a COPYVIO
/* Study of cults */ delete content that has been fact-tagged since February 2007
/* See also */ That governments' list is closed to editor's selections; restore one observed consensus-by-edit specific group listing - see talk; restore a history and a sociology link
/* See also */ not a list of suspected cults, we already have a page for that...
